name: Enchanted Hearts
summary: After witnessing a handsome stranger in peril, you rush to save him, only to unleash a magical power you never knew you had. Little did you know, you're actually part of a bloodline of powerful witches and warlocks. Soon after, you receive an invitation to attend Nocturne Academy, a school for supernatural beings, to help you master your newfound abilities. However, you soon find yourself caught in the middle of an ancient feud between werewolves and vampires.
